    • Method Detail

      • resize

        public void resize(int w,
                   int h)
        resizes the graphic to the specified size. Note that if this Graphic was constructed with an image address, the methods will scale the original image at that address. If this Graphic was constructed from an image, it will scale itself, which may result in loss of resolution when going from small to large
        Parameters:
        w -
        h -
